name: ImageS3
body:
ImageS3 is an Amazon S3-based image hosting service for developers. It is designed to store, resize and manage images for all your web and mobile applications in one place.

###Features:
 - Cloud-based service to host images for all your projects.
 - Web-based interface which enables you to easy setup projects and monitor status in real time. 
 - RESTful APIs
 - Keep image resizing endpoint as simple as possible - only one url parameter required!
 - Build with scalable infrastructures - Play framework, MongoDB and Amazon S3.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
